abstract: An entitlement that allows an app to access financial data in FinanceKit.
overview:
## Discussion

Add this entitlement to your app to use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/FinanceKit] to read financial data, and read and write order data. You need to get consent from the person using your app to access data in FinanceKit.

To request this entitlement for your app, [https://developer.apple.com/contact/request/financekit/].

# FinanceKit

**Property List Key**

An entitlement that allows an app to access financial data in FinanceKit.

## Discussion

Add this entitlement to your app to use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/FinanceKit] to read financial data, and read and write order data. You need to get consent from the person using your app to access data in FinanceKit.

To request this entitlement for your app, [https://developer.apple.com/contact/request/financekit/].
title: FinanceKit
